name: Point (itch) (Plapy)
description:
Out in the void, Chambers were broken because of the massive "Puller" event. It destroys all the hope of Planet Plapy. 

Point is the only one left out of his fellowmen. Considering his Thanatophobia (Fear of Death), he still trying to figure things on how he can help them.

Point is a 2D game. Out in the void, Point (The main player) is hopeless. Not until he founds out that he can change into Astral form. Making Point travel through walls, time and space.

But the remain of Pullers (Blackhole) is still on his way.
